#!/bin/bash
#lesslinux provides ethtool #lesslinux license BSD
PATH=/bin:/sbin:/usr/bin:/usr/sbin:/static/bin:/static/sbin export PATH
. /etc/rc.defaults . /etc/rc.subr/extractbootparams . /etc/rc.subr/colors
case $1 in start) printf "$bold===> Searching sensors $normal\n" if sensors ; then echo '---> sensors works.' else yes yes | sensors-detect fi ;; esac
